attributes.action: Immediately stop pandering to Islamic fundamentalists and ban ALL preachers from spreading hate and division
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The people of this country have had enough of seeing Islamic fundamentalists taking advantage of this countries liberal values. We demand the government immediately Prosribe and prosecute ALL fundamentalist muslim groups. preaching propaganda and hate mongering. Deport those people found guilty of encouraging terrorism and charge and jail British born troublemakers. Time and again it is announced that terrorists have been recruited in Britain. This is not only a slight on loyal British Muslims but also shameful on the part of this governments overriding protection of perpetrators instead of decent people.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
